descriptionHtml:
[color=#3d85c6][size=5][b][center][img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/uploads//monthly_04_2016/post-20507374-0-43671100-1460257401.jpg[/img][/center]

What this mod is.[/b]
[/size][/color]
[size=4]Unique beast races aims to restore the look and feel of the beast race player characters from Morrowind by replacing the body models, boot models, and armor models for beast races.
[/size]
[color=#3d85c6][size=5][b]What this mod does now.[/b][/size]
[/color][size=4]
As of right now, all argonian boots both male and female have been replaced with custom models. All Argonian and Khajiit armor has been edited to accommodate the altered body models. With Khajiit having temporary boot replacers until proper models are finished.
[/size][size=5]
[/size][color=#3d85c6][size=5][b]What this mod will do.[/b][/size]
[/color]
[size=4]All Khajiit boots will be replaced with proper boots. For now, Khajiit have temporary placeholders for only the boots.

[color=#3d85c6][size=5][b]NSFW version?[/b][/size]
[/color]
[size=4]As requested by some users, it has been decided to make the main mod non adult.
I'll decide later if this mod should have a separate adult version.[/size][/size]
[b]
[/b][size=5][color=#ff0000][b]How to install this mod.[/b][/color]
[/size]
[size=4]Drag and drop UBR's meshes and texture folders with its esp into the main skyrim data folder. Or use a mod manager.[/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Possible incompatibilities with this mod.[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4]Retextures of the body won't work, you need to replace manually the textures in the UBR folder and tweak them so that there is no gap between feet and body.
[/size][size=5]
[color=#f1c232][b]Recommended similar mods.[/b]
[/color][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52918/?][color=#00FFFF][size=4][b]Better Claws and Gauntlets by Derok[/b][/size][/color][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/944/?][color=#00FFFF][size=4][b]Better Beast Races by Xenius[/b][/size][/color][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5941/?][color=#00FFFF][size=4][b]Cover Khajiits by mrLenski[/b][/size][/color][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11371/?][color=#00FFFF][size=4][b]WHITER TEETH 4all - Orc Khajiit Argonian Werewolf by 83Willow[/b][/size][/color][/url]

[b][color=#f1c232][size=4]
Credits-[/size][/color][/b]
[b]bilotheretard:[/b] starting the mod
[b]senviro:[/b] starting the mod and high poly models
[b]derok:[/b] main work on the mod
[b]drohung:[/b] various work on the mod
[b]damian:[/b] armor and boots
[b]XFaLlOuTgOdX:[/b] cool guy
[b]sundracon:[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4196/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4196/?
[/url]NyteKitsune: banner art
author: Derok
